places.name: Kitchen
descriptions: short:This appears to be the kitchen of the space station, and there is lots of food and water in here

places.name: Radial Thruster
description: short:The fuel and oxygen tanks look to be empty. It looks like you need to find fuel and oxygen tanks.

places.name: corridor with leak
description: short:You hear a small hissing. There might be a leak in this corridor.

places.name: canteen
descriptions: short:This appears to be the canteen of the space station. There is more food and water in here.

places.name: pantry door
description: short:There is a solid door stopping you from entering the pantry. There is likely more food, or perhaps other things, inside.

places.name: pantry
descriptions: short:This is the pantry of the space station. There are lots of reserve food stocks in here.

places.name: hybernation room
descriptions: short:This appears to be the hibernation room. There are hundreds of pods stacked against the walls in here. Everybody else is dead, their pods have a stab mark and a red X on it

places.name: canteen
descriptions: short:This appears to be the canteen of the space station. There is more food and water in here.

places.name: entry to level 2
descriptions: short:It is an empty room, and there is a corridor leading to level two above you. It is blocked by some debris.

places.name: level 2 door
description: short:There is a pile of debris blocking the corridor to level two of the station. You would need some kind of high power torch to bust through it.

places.name: map room
descriptions: short:There appears to be a projected hologram of the space station first level in the center of the room.

places.name: electrical room
descriptions: short:This is the electrical room of the space station. There are lots of panels and some electrical equipment in here.

places.name: electrical room door
description: short:There is a lock on the door to the elecrtical room. You might need a keycard to get in.

places.name: north west control room
descriptions: short:This appears to be part of the control room for the space station, the north west quadrant. There are lots of broken moniters in here, all with red Xs...

places.name: south west control room
descriptions: short:This is another part of the control room for the space station, the south west quadrant. There are lots of weapon moniters in here. Curiously, they are fully functional and unharmed.

places.name: fitness room
descriptions: short:It definatly looks like a space fitness room in here. There are lots of bungees for resistance strength training, and treadmills with elastics to pull you back down after your stride.

places.name: engine room
descriptions: short:This appears to be the engineering part of the space station, where all the engineers make the thrusters work. This room might be useful to reenable the thrusters...

places.name: engine room door
description: short:This door appears to be blocking the way to the engine room. You might need a keycard to get in there to learn more about the thrusters...

places.name: north east control room
descriptions: short:This is another part of the control room for the space station, the north east quadrant. There are more moniters in here, presumably for controlling life support. They are damaged, but still functional.
